Name an ultimate that requires a target to be anything other than "within targeting range."

If you said Gnar, you're still wrong. His ultimate's restriction is on himself.

Yes, the CC exists in multiple champions' kits, although on less than half of the champions in the game. But while the majority of ultimates have no restriction, or specifically work better if used at a specific time, Yasuo's ultimate can *only* be done within 0.5-1 second frames of a specific set of crowd control effects.

Dodge the CC, Yasuo can't ult. There are so very few champions with *targeted* Airborne CC that this solution will work in the majority of real game situations. And in other situations? Don't put yourself out as a target for Yasuo, unless you're the tank and you're baiting him. Playing defensively is the oldest strategy in the game, and people still forget that it *works.*
> To the people saying his ult doesn't do damage ????? Are u om crack?? To say yasuo doesn't deal damage is to say illaoi is bad in team fights- it's a lie

His ***ultimate*** doesn't do significant damage. Yasuo himself has high DPS, yes, but the core of his ultimate is the % Bonus Armor Pen, not the *pathetic* initial damage.
